title: Case-Based Problem-Solving Skill Development Course for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Foundations of Instructional Theory and Classroom Teaching Experience
context.additional_context: Problem-solving training course for in-service practitioners using real-world cases in language education.

learning_goals: Learners can systematically analyze complex problem situations in real educational settings and design solutions.
Learners can improve problem-solving strategies by incorporating peer feedback in case-based discussions.
Learners can design instructional activities requiring higher-order thinking to propose strategies that promote learner engagement.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
